name: rrule
description: JavaScript library for working with recurrence rules for calendar dates.
author: Jakub Roztocil and Lars Sch√∂ning

scripts.start: rollup src/rrule.js --o lib/rrule.js --f umd -n rrule --config rollup.config.js; rollup src/nlp.js --o lib/nlp.js --f umd -n nlp --globals rrule:rrule --config rollup.config.js
scripts.demo: rollup src/rrule.js --o demo/rrule.js --f umd -n rrule --config rollup.config.js; rollup src/nlp.js --o demo/nlp.js --f umd -n nlp --globals rrule:rrule --config rollup.config.js
